volume.name: The New Wave Vs. the Volunteers

deck: When Kull unleashes an ancient curse upon Valusia that's just the start of his troubles. Soon he's embroiled in a conflict with enemies both foreign and domestic.
description: Following an earthquake in Valusia, Kull vows to rebuild the city-state greater than before. But when his workmen uncover an ancient tomb he scoffs at their superstitious nature and breaks an ancient seal, unleashing a curse on the land. That soon leads to civil unrest while at the same time his grant of asylum to a foreign criminal puts Valusia on the path to war with Zarfhaana.
name: The Power and the Kingdom
In the Hall of the Mountain King

description:
Conan leaves Cimmeria to find adventure

*Spoilers*

Conan departs his country for a life of adventure. He get captured by one group, rescued and recruited by another. Upon rescuing his new found friend he meets a monk named Ixastophanis who use magic to aid their escape. when the adventure is over the priest forbiddingly tells Conan they will meet again as he makes off with a golden shard
name: The Snow That Slays

description:
Conan's adventures lead him to the elegant fencer Andamo.

*Spoilers*

Conan continues his journey and ends up in a city where he quickly gets into a scuffle and flees to the rooftops. From there he sees Andamo who he assists in another battle. the two then go to a tavern to drink and talk where they are attacked by a rock golem. Conan saves who he can and stops the best he is then brought before the man responsible for the golem by Andamo. All this is watched by Moru, Andamo's bitter enemy and rival.
name: Blood Days in Brythunia

description:
Conan is in the village when suddenly he is attacked by people with swords. They won't stop but to kill Conan. And he must stop them. Then he is attacked by their leader. Will he defeat him and his crew?

*spoilers*

As Conan and Andamo watch the Golem is set upon by a metal golem and as they do battle their masters wach from on high. When conan is captured Andamo flees and he is saved by the pict Moru. They then enter battle with conan causing the monsters to fuse together and their masters to burst into flames. Moru's woman dies but all he cares for is a golden shard left by a priest. Andamo secures the other and they all go their separate ways.
name: Between Twin Terrors

description:
Conan and the mysterious Welyn meet.

*Spoilers*

Conan rescues a woman from some assassins and hears she has the plague. He is warned to leave the city yet follows the woman home when she regails him with stories of men he has met. He eventually rips her clothes off and finds her covered with demons. she shows him a chest containing the cure only to himself be merged with a demon in the box. he gives her the antidote and returns to the city where the demon jumps hosts. Conan leave the city but is troubled about her visions of the golden amulet shards.
name: The Woman Who Walks Alone

description:
Conan is injured and recovering finds peace.

*Spoilers*

Conan battles a wild tiger and emerges victorious but wounded and bleeding out, he collapses and is found by a kind family who take him in and nurse him back to health. Once recovered he stays with the family to help out on their farm, he even considers staying their permanently. His dreams however are troubled, visions of the priest he rescued. After leaving the family for a day or so he returns to find their dead bodies and the farm on fire. he buries them as well as his dreams of peace and returns to the life of a wanderer.
name: The Slavers

description:
Conan has a run in with two valkyrie

*Spoilers*

Conan falls down a waterfall and meets a yellow skinned valkyrie who wants to know the joys of mans world, Conan makes love to her only for her sister to come to retrieve her. They battle but in the end she returns to Asgard and conan continues on his adventures.
name: The Choosers of the Slain!

description:
Conan encounters a theif

*spoilers*

Conan reaches a town and with no food or money he steal and gives the goods to a local merchant, the merchant pays him a good sum but send his men to kill him and get the money back. Conan defeats his pursuers and follows the merchant to a cave where they are attacked by a demon. Conan escapes but is robbed by the thieves eh had originally stolen from. he continues on with his adventure.

NOTE- This issue's tale is a "free" adaptation of the story by Clark Ashton Smith
name: Weird of Avoosl Wuthoqquan

description: All the major players looking for and possessing shards of Tolometh receive visions via a mysterious amulet.
name: Of Wings and Warriors

description:
Andamo, Moru and Welyn form an alliance.

*Spoilers*

Andamo and Mru arrive at the same place that Welyn is dancing. The two are instantly entranced by her movements much to the dismay of the other women. The men compare notes about the amulet shards and eventually start to fight. Welyn breaks it up and proposes an alliance so they can all benefit. Unknown to them she plans to kill them both once they have outlived their usefulness.
name: Of Wings and Warriors

description:
Andamo, Welyn, and Moru are captured and need rescuing fast!

*Spoilers*

Andamo, Welyn, and Moru are in a local prison with no way out. Lucky for them Daedikaron and Tros have arrived in town. They however are reluctant to help the captives until

Shimata-Kawa and Ixastophanis arrive. The group band together with conan and flee the town with their shards in toe.

NOTE - This issue is a "loose" adaptation of the tale by Clark Ashton Smith.
name: The Inquisitors of Ong

description:
The group gets separated and are accosted by the demonic patriarch.

*Spoilers*

In the desert of Yondo the group gets separated and Shimata and Conan search for the others and Shimata tells him the legend of Tolometh. They find all their friends and slay a demon but in the process Welyn is cursed and Daedikaron and Tros are transformed briefly by sorcery.

Note - This is a "loose" adaptation of the Clark Ashton Smith tale.
name: The Abominations of Yondo

description:
Our heroes get closer to their destination and find more trouble afoot they also lose two members.

*Spoilers*

The group meet up with Moru and andamo who are locked in battle. They separate the two and discuss the shards. Andamo is revealed allied with their enemies. The group find themselves at the enemy's strong hold and immediately lose two members the artificial Tos and his creator Daedikaron.
name: Into the Citadel of Sin

description: In the conclusion to the massive story of Conan's earliest adventures Conan and his allies must face the demonic Patriarch as Tolometh rises from his slumber of a thousand years.
name: Tolometh Rising

description: Alpha Flight is reinstated by Department H with Heather, Puck, Jefferies and Mac all returning and some new faces also. They take on a newly reconstituted Zodiac in order to save Canada, but not all is as it seems.
name: Horoscope

description: The Master shows up at the Department H headquarters and Alpha Flight runs him off. Later several versions of the Master appear and battle each member of Alpha Flight separately. It turns out that these are "semi-organic synthoids" designed to test Alpha Flight and not the Master after all.
name: Fighting the Masters

description: The senior team members go to a town named Orloo, where most of the team grew up, and battle a resurrected Chinook. The younger members "kidnap" Sunfire and go for a joyride. When they stop at a diner for some food, they meet Mesmero.
name: Bury Your Dead

description: The senior members return from Orloo to find the younger members have left with Sunfire. Coordinator Proctor visits Miss DeLaSalle at Hull House and takes Lilli, who has powers, with him. The senior team members find the younger ones at the diner. They have been mesmerized.
name: Mesmerized

description: Alpha Flight battles each other under the influence of Mesmero. They finally overcome his powers but he escapes. Diamond Lil arrives at Department H to check on her husband, Madison Jefferies who went missing in issue #1 .
name: Mesmerized, Part 2

description: Sasquatch breaks out of Department H and General Clarke sends Puck in pursuit. Puck discovers that Sasquatch is not Walter Langowski as was thought but a true Sasquatch with a family. Department H arrives to recapture Sasquatch.
name: Wildlife

description: Department H is testing their new creations, a new living bio-energy Sentinels. The Sentinels main purpose is to keep Alpha Flight in check. The team is given a new mission. They are to hunt and retrieve Weapon X or better known to the Marvel Universe as Wolverine.
name: Insides

description: After a training session with Wolverine synthoids, Heather is engulfed in a glowing glob and taken away. Meanwhile, Sunfire's radiation poisoning is causing his condition to deteriorate. The glowing glob delivers Heather to a room at Department H where they mess around with her memories to keep her addled. Mac briefs the Alphans with an incorrect version of Wolverine's (Weapon X) history. Puck, having remembered about Jefferies, runs to the briefing to find them watching a video showing Wolverine murdering Madison Jefferies.
name: The Weapon X-Files

description:
[Note: The events in this story are also depicted, from other perspectives, in the story in THE UNCANNY X-MEN #355.]

From the command center at Canada’s Department H, General Clarke oversees Alpha Flight’s mission to capture Wolverine (referred to as Weapon X), wanted for the murder of Madison Jeffries. Aboard their jet, the team locates by tracking the adamantium in his skeleton. Soon, they are swooping down over him as he rides his motorcycle, transporting a wrapped and bound figure.

At Department H, Clarke is briefly called away to tend to an altercation involving Lilli, a frightened young woman who can become intangible. He has his medical team sedate her.

In the woods, is soon confronted by Alpha Flight, who block the road. He exchanges a few words with them, then gets back on his bike and resumes his trip, while Clarke observes via surveillance equipment in Manbot’s sensors.

Elsewhere, in , Shiro Yoshida tries to arrange a return to his native , where he hopes to deal with his radiation poisoning.

On the roadway, battles the rest of Alpha flight as Rogue, returning from the city, flies overhead and witnesses the melee. She tells she will return with the X-Men. Meanwhile, Murmur and Sasquatch prevent Sauron’s attempted escape.

The Canadian super-team corner at a service station, when Vindicator notices ’s claws are bone, not adamantium, putting lie to the perception Alpha Flight had that their jet’s sensors located by tracking his metal-laced skeleton. Suddenly, is decked by Sasquatch (at Murmur’s command). He leaps to his feet and the conflict resumes, just as the X-Men arrive. The two teams immediately face off against each other. Cannonball launches himself at Flex, but stops short when it’s apparent the Alphan doesn’t seek a fight. They instead talk.

The battle goes on with Storm disabling Vindicator, Maggott challenging Murmur, Rogue tackling Radius, and fighting the rest, until Cannonball shouts to get everyone’s attention. He’s learned from Flex that Alpha Flight’s mission is to apprehend for a murder Department H claimed he committed, but the X-Men know was with them at the time. Vindicator believes them, and her mistrust of Clarke and Department H grows. makes peace with his one-time teammates, while Clarke observes with dissatisfaction from his command center.
name: North & South

description:
Guardian, Puck and a furious Vindicator confront General Clark, who had ordered Alpha Flight to apprehend Wolverine, which turned out to be a fool's errand. Clarke claims the fiasco was not deliberate, but rather due to faulty intelligence. Nonetheless, the team refuses to undertake his follow-up mission, and so Clarke retreats to his lab, where he makes a call to put a plan into action.

During Alpha Flight's downtime, Puck warns Radius to become more of a team player; Flex learns the biological father of Radius, his brother, is Unus the Untouchable; and Heather packs, intending to leave. Puck comes to talk to her, but their conversation is interrupted by an urgent email warning her Alpha Flight's lives are in danger, and asking her to meet at the Prometheus Division.

Meanwhile, in Paris, Virgo and Taurus teleport to rejoin the rest of the rebuilding Zodiac after Taurus had just killed two innocent persons.

At Department H, the team meet Dr. Myra Haddock, author of the email. With Clarke's Epsilon Guards hot on the Alphans' heels, Dr. Haddock hides them by sending them into the Prometheus Pit. As the team transitions to the Microverse, Clarke arrives and assures Haddock that her unwilling deception ensured further funding for her research.

The Alphans eventually find themselves on the Microversal world of Ant Tica, where the native Insectivorid population has been subjugated by one Baron Zebek. The Baron's Shadow Priests escort Alpha Flight to his palace where he warmly welcomes them.

Later, Zebek and Alpha Flight are at an arena where, to most of the team's horror, they witness a brutal gladiatorial contest. They quickly leave, and while Guardian flies off to investigate some strange chanting, the rest discover several Insectivorids, as well as Manbot, being subjected to the terror of the body banks. They try to make their way to rescue their android teammate.

Within a mountain peak, Guardian uncovers the source of the chanting: workers constructing a powerful weapon called the Quarkarion, capable of destroying the Microverse and part of Earth.

As Guardian reunites with Alpha flight to debrief them, they are met by the Micronauts, Arcturus Rann, Mari, Bug and Dexam.
name: Small Sacrifices

description:
On the Microversal world of Ant Tica, while the respective members of Alpha Flight and the Micronauts sort out each other's motives, Baron Zebek, in his centaur form, arrives and orders his soldiers to apprehend them all. The two teams fight back, holding off the soldiers long enough for Commander Arcturus Rann to summon his ship, the Endeavor, allowing them to escape.

Meanwhile, on Earth at department H, General Clarke meets with his unseen superior who warns him that his activities had better not overstep the boundaries that have been set. Elsewhere in the facility, Diamond Lil undergoes a torturous procedure.

Back in the Microverse, having regrouped, Vindicator, Murmur, Flex, Mari and Dexam infiltrate the Body Banks where they locate and free Manbot. Soon, Mari incites the subjugated Insectivorids to revolt, and they storm out of the Body Banks. At the mountain where the devastating Quarkarion is being constructed, Guardian, Puck, Radius, Rann and Bug sneak in and try to overpower the guards and the workers. However, Zebek arrives and the battle begins in earnest.

While the revolt spills into the Baron's palace, the heroes struggle with Zebek's augmented centaur-like form. Guardian finally defeats Zebek by disabling the magnetic couplings holding him together, allowing his allies to topple the bomb, rendering it inert.

As the revolution proceeds, Dexam decides to remain on Ant Tica and the other Micronauts depart. Manbot gives the retrieval signal and Alpha Flight dematerializes.
name: MicroCosm

description: Alpha Flight arrives from the microverse into a lab under attack by the Zodiac. Mac leads the team rashly into battle, causing Murmur to get badly wounded. They make a retreat in order to regroup and get separated. The team learns that the Zodiac are after the Nth Projector from the lab (last seen in Marvel Two-in-One issue #58). The Zodiac escape but not after Sasquatch is killed and General Clarke dies trying to contain the building's nuclear reactor. Heather's suit contains most of the heat from the reactor but, when a part fails, she must remove it before her suit fries with her in it. This is almost exactly what happened in Alpha Flight (1983 series) issue #12 with Mac when he "died".
name: H

description: This is mostly a filler issue that shows some of the duties of a man named Basil Kilgrew who works at Department H. Alpha is recovering from their fight with the Zodiac and Basil Kilgrew, seeing the outcome, decides that he needs to do more to help them. He sends an anonymous file to Puck just before he's killed in an elevator "accident".
name: Floor 13

description: The teams remember Sasquatch at his funeral, still thinking it's their old friend Walter Langkowski.
name: Reflection

description: Alpha Flight investigates reports of missing people in a town including the Canadian Prime Minister's wife. They find the women and children gathered in a church but, even though they appear alive, Manbot detects no life signs. Alpha Flight later finds the missing men in the process of building the Tower of Babel for the Brass Bishop. Meanwhile Walter Langowski has caught up with Shaman and Northstar has found his sister, Aurora, at the North Pole.
name: Attack of the Killer Zombies!

description: Alpha Flight heads into the Tower of Babel. Puck remembers that there is a key that can unlock any door hidden inside. The Brass Bishop will use it to get into Heaven to take a soul. He wants to use the soul to exchange it for his which he sold to Mephisto. The Brass Bishop takes over Puck and forces him to lead them to the key. While his soul is inside Dargil, Puck is able to overcome him with the aid of the other souls inside. That and Alpha Flight's help overcome the Brass Bishop and Mephisto appears to claim his soul.
name: Redemption

description: Sunfire returns to Department H for answers about his "radiation poisoning" and is not happy. Big Hero 6 calls for help when X the Unknowable attacks an amusement park in Japan. Sunfire leaves to help and Alpha follows. Meanwhile, Northstar meets Sasquatch and Shaman outside the Department H headquarters looking for his sister, but they warn him about going inside. Dr Huxley, having been treated unkindly by the new director, heads to the basement and his super secret creation, the new Weapon X. Unfortunately, Weapon X has escaped.
name: Tokyo Takedown

description: Alpha Flight discovers the new Weapon X project and take off after him. They find him draining energy from power transformers and nuclear power plants heading west. When they catch up to him, the original Alpha Flight shows up and they are not happy with the new team. It is also revealed in this issue that Flex and Radius are not brothers.
name: Alpha: Omega, Part 1

description: The two Alpha Flight teams fight each other as the new Weapon X escapes. The original team are trying to save Aurora's life as she too was infected with the Weapon X virus. Meanwhile both Guardians are wondering who is the real deal.
name: Alpha:Omega part 2

description: The new team joins forces with the original Alphas to stop Weapon X from releasing a toxic bacteria across the world.
name: Alpha:Omega part 3 of 3

description:
For decades, readers thought the Punisher's crusade against the criminal underworld began with the brutal murder of his loving wife and children in Central Park. But that isn't the whole story. In the tradition of Wolverine: Origin, witness the true birth of the Punisher years before, as Marine Frank Castle the man enters his third tour of duty in Vietnam, but leaves a force of nature!

1972.

On the Cambodian border, there is a garrison called Forge Valley Firebase. It is filled with junkies, fiends,incompetents and F~ckups. And whether they like it or not, they are at war. At war with an enemy whos planning to kill them all in one fell swoop. Every one of them wants to go home. But there is another who walks among them. His name is Frank Castle. And he is at home.

The story is narrated by Stevie Goodwin, a young idealist man who is on the verge of going back home. He doesn't want to be like Captain Frank Castle, "in love" with war.

In this very first issue, we see the daily life of a bunch of soldiers from the Valley Forge firebase, bets on plane crashing, embush on the enemy, surprise inspection of the base,

We meet some charismatic people like the demotivated Colonel Ottman, the grumpy General Padden who wants to shut the base down and who's led to a killing place by Frank Castle.

Frank Castle has this voice inside of him, telling him to "say the word" and the voice will offer him a lifetime war.
name: The First Day

description:
The birth of the Punisher continues in another pulse-pounding issue as Captain Frank Castle stares down the darkness inside of him.

Garth Ennis's brutal reimagining of The Punisher's origin continues.
name: The Second Day

description:
When was Frank Castle's murderous rage born? Possibly this issue. Witness the blaze of terror that is the Punisher's origin, set to the backdrop of the Vietnam War. Will Castle kill one of his own?

Part 3 of The Punisher: Born; the acclaimed reimagining of the origns of Marvel's deadliest vigilante.
name: The Third Day

description:
Witness the true beginning of Captain Frank Castle's metamorphosis into the Punisher. You'll never look at the Punisher the same way again after the shocking climax to this bestselling limited series!

Frank Castle falls into the soil of Cambodia with the rest of his garrison. What emerges from the same massacre will become deaths deadliest servant.

The Punisher is born in all his inglory.
name: The Last Day

description: The "Bucky Issue" resurfaces, as Cap must answer for his World War II history with young Bucky Barnes fighting by his side.
name: The Bucky Issue

description: In this special two-part story, celebrated artist Eddie Campbell (From Hell) joins Robert Morales! Captain America finds himself at the crossroads where his past and a possible future meet when he's faced with a super-villain from his alternate future. As the battle royale commences, Cap finds an ally in the future's one and old Captain America: the TRUTH's very own Isaiah Bradley!
name: Requiem, Part 1

description: In this special two-part story, celebrated artist Eddie Campbell (From Hell) joins Robert Morales! Captain America finds himself at the crossroads where his past and a possible future meet when he's faced with a super-villain from his alternate future. As the battle royale commences, Cap finds an ally in the future's one and old Captain America: the TRUTH's very own Isaiah Bradley!
name: Requiem, Part 2

description:
AVENGERS DISASSEMBLED TIE-IN! Marvel Knights no more! Cap returns to the Marvel Universe proper, where he's thrown headfirst into one of the most hectic days of his career. Hydra has abducted a senator who's being prepped to run as the next president. Nick Fury enlists the aid of Captain America to bring the senator back home. Meanwhile, all is not right within the S.H.I.E.L.D. organization... who is the puppet master pulling the strings? You won't believe it when you see it!

Captain America is in a fight with Mr. Hyde who has recently escaped. Captain America incapacitates him and then leaves him for the local law authorities to take into custody. Later that day, Cap heads to his local video store to rent a movie. On his way home he finds Diamondback sitting on his steps waiting for him. He invites her in. Shortly after they enter, they get a knock on the door. It turns out to be Col. Nick Fury.

Col. Fury states that he has a new mission for the both of them and invites them to join him on the sub-carrier. Once aboard, he tells the pair that Hydra has taken a senator hostage and requests their help in getting him back. Cap agrees and jumps out of the sub-carrier just over the landing zone with Diamondback. As they're approaching the compound, they are fired upon. They infiltrate the base and begin to interrogate a few Hyra agents in order to get the whereabouts of the Senator. The Senator is rescued from the compound and returned to the carrier. While Cap and Diamondback are resting, Col Nick Fury and the Senator reveal in their conversation that the whole thing was a publicity stunt. It was orcestrated to help the Senator get his parties nomination and eventually more votes in the up-and-coming presidential election.

As they are dropped off near their homes, Diamondback enters to report to her boss...the Red Skull!
name: Super Patriot (Part 1)

description: Cap and Diamondback are reunited after all these years, but their reunion is Bittersweet, as Cap is consumed with remorse over the cataclysmic events taking place in Avengers. With that on his mind, Cap isn't exactly the best company to have on a dinner date. Meanwhile, just what exactly is going on over at S.H.I.E.L.D and how is it that Nick Fury is completely unaware? Featuring an appearance by everyone's favorite Frenchman, Batroc the Leaper.
name: Super Patriot (Part 2)

description: Mr. Hyde, Hydra, The Red Skull, Batroc The Leaper... this story wouldn't be complete without an appearance by the Serpent Society, and here it is! Cap and Diamondback find themselves at the mercy of these treacherous snakes -- will they be able to escape? Will Diamondback even fight against her old teammates? What does all this have to do with those evil S.H.I.E.L.D. agents and a certain Red-Skulled villain that has been lurking in the background? Find out in September!
name: Super Patriot (Part 3)

description: AVENGERS DISASSEMBLED TIE-IN! PART 4 (OF 4) After months of careful planning, the Red Skull makes his move. Captain America and his old sparring partner are in for the most grueling battle they've ever had. The Red Skull has had some help from a certain rebel faction inside S.H.I.E.L.D. and he now has strength and agility that greatly overshadow the fighting prowess of our star-spangled hero. This issue is not to be missed!
name: Super Patriot (Part 4)

description:
Overview

"Forging The Sword" part 1. The island of Genosha was once a thriving nation of mutants, built from the ground up by Magneto, the mutant Master of Magnetism. Then, one day, an apocalyptic attack killed every man, woman and child, and reduced an entire society to rubble within hours. Now, Professor Charles Xavier -- legendary founder of the X-Men, and the man who dreams of peaceful coexistence between humans and mutants -- has come to Genosha with one intention: to rebuild a nation from its ashes. This brand-new X-Men: Reload series features stories and art from the creative team that brought you X-Treme X-Men.

Spoilers

In Genosha, Xavier thinks back about the destruction that his twin sister, Cassandra Nova, caused. Resolving his emotions, Xavier opens a secret compartment on the bottom of the coffin near him. He removes an outfit that seems more soldier-like and a handful of electronic devices, including weapons. Trying to pick the coffin off the ground, he is embarrassingly thrown to the ground by his own momentum. A ghostly Moira MacTaggert appears near him and questions him of his intentions in Genosha. Xavier tells the mirage that he plans to figure out what has caused the large spike in mutant births. Elsewhere, Unus watches Xavier from afar and commands his three lackeys nearby him to go to Xavier and teach him a lesson. Back with Xavier, Moira has disappeared and Xavier finds a new mutant named Wicked.

Talking to Wicked and seeing her powers in action, Xavier is stopped by Unus and his group as they show up to attack him. Xavier stops the three lackeys, while a new comer named Freakshow easily dispatches Unus. Xavier thanks the two mutants, Freakshow and Wicked, telling them that he would like to teach them, as he once taught the X-Men. After arriving at his destination, he psychically urges Freakshow and Wicked to go to bed. As the two of them walk away, Xavier turns around to meet an old ally, who has been waiting for him to arrive, the man named Magneto.
name: Forging the Sword, Part 1: Paint It Black

description: "Forging The Sword" part 2. The island of Genosha was once a thriving nation of mutants, built from the ground up by Magneto, the mutant Master of Magnetism. Then, one day, an apocalyptic attack killed every man, woman and child, and reduced an entire society to rubble within hours. Now, Professor Charles Xavier -- legendary founder of the X-Men, and the man who dreams of peaceful coexistence between humans and mutants -- has come to Genosha with one intention: to rebuild a nation from its ashes. This brand-new X-Men: Reload series features stories and art from the creative team that brought you X-Treme X-Men.
name: Forging the Sword - part 2: With a Little Help from My Friends

description: Professor X works amid the ashes of Genosha to rebuild the once-proud mutant nation. But certain people would prefer that Genosha stay destroyed – and are willing to kill to make sure that the nation of mutants doesn’t rise again.
name: Forging the Sword - part 3: Wild Things

description: Overview The Magistrates were once the human rulers of Genosha…and now they want it back! Professor X and his ragtag team find their first major test as they’re faced with an attack from all sides, but some unlikely allies wait in the wings as well! This is the moment when Xavier’s Dream hangs in the balance, and the team must decide whether they will draw the sword and accept the challenge…or surrender in the fight for mutantkind!
name: Forging the Sword: Conclusion

description:
Overview

Professor Xavier has now assembled his ragtag team of Magneto and Callisto, with youngsters Wicked, Freakshow and Shola under their tutelage. Already struggling to keep the peace in Genosha as well as between themselves, will the team have the strength to get to the bottom of simultaneous terrorist attacks on X-Corp offices around the world?
name: Food Fight!

description: OverviewAs Professor Xavier and Magneto cobble together the fragile pieces of the once-proud island nation of Genosha, hostile outside forces attempt to undo all that they have accomplished!
name: Who's Better, Who's Best!

description: OverviewWho are the 16 Million, and what do they have against Professor X?
name: Bad Moon Rising

description:
Overview

Professor X continues to bring order and justice to Genosha, but will the citizens be willing to follow him after they discover his terrible secret?
name: Saturday Night Fever: Part 1

description: The Avengers are dead, the S.H.I.E.L.D. Helicarrier destroyed and the Capitol dome has been turned into a giant toilet! Something strange, impossible even, is going on in Washington D.C. and it’s up to the Exiles to get to the bottom of it, all before next month’s issue #50!
name: Mission Impossible

description: Celebrate the Exiles 50th-issue anniversary as the reality-trotting team goes head-to-head against no less than the Brotherhood of Evil Mutants! There’s someone very familiar leading the Brotherhood, someone who could very well put an end to the Exiles once and for all!
name: The Big M, Part 1

description: "THE BIG M" PART 2 (OF 2) A 50th-issue spectacular! Celebrate the Exiles 50th-issue anniversary as the reality-trotting team goes head-to-head against no less than the Brotherhood of Evil Mutants! There’s someone very familiar leading the Brotherhood, someone who very well could put an end to the Exiles once and for all!
name: The Big M, Part 2

description:
The Exiles must stop the Avengers and Doctor Doom before they destroy the Earth! And did someone say Ego, The Living Planet? You bet they did!

The Exiles mission: Stop Avengers and Dr. Doom.

Also in this issue - Ego the Living Planet.
name: Living Planet, Part 1

description:
Ego the Living Planet – a father?! It’s up to the Exiles, the Avengers, and the Fantastic Four to keep the Earth from becoming Ego Junior!

The Exiles mission: Stop Avengers and Dr. Doom.

Also in this issue - Ego the Living Planet.
name: Living Planet, Part 2

description: A seemingly trivial, low-key mission spirals into a cataclysmic, universe-shattering disaster...all because of a Danish?! The Exiles’ most hilarious adventure yet!
name: Rube Goldberg

description:
The Exiles enter into a world of swords and sorcery that any true X-fan will enjoy! Guest-starring the villainy of Kulan Gath! With 3 issues of "Exiles" coming out this month, this is the PERFECT time to get in on the action!

Kulan Gath, a blast from the past, casts a spell that transforms the present into the Hyborean age! If the Exiles are also caught in the grip of this incantation, how will they be able to recover to complete their mission and will they fall prey to the even greater evil that's aloof ?
name: Bump In The Night, Part 1

description:
The Exiles' foray into a world of swords and sorcery continues! Guest-starring the villainy of Kulan Gath! With 3 issues of "Exiles" coming out this month, this is the PERFECT time to get in on the action!

Finally free from the Master Spell, the Exiles join forces with Spider-Man, Magik, and the most unlikely of allies, Kulan Gath, to take on Zarathos. While nine against the entire Vizier's guard hardly seems fair, some unexpected aid is on the way to even the odds.
name: Bump In The Night, Part 2

description:
Witness the deadly conclusion as Kulan Gath exacts his final revenge. With 3 issues of "Exiles" coming out this month, this is the PERFECT time to get in on the action!

Casualties befall both sides of the battlefield as crosses and double-crosses take place! Kulan Gath has regained control of the Master Spell and now has the ability to make its effects global. How will the Exiles supplant him and what's been bothering Heather all this time?
name: Bump In The Night, Part 3

description: When six of Marvel’s most violent and cunning villains join forces, the fate of every hero in the world is at stake. Sabretooth, Bullseye, the Juggernaut, Deadpool, Sandman and the Vulture -- are forced to work together by a mysterious agent who somehow knows every dark and dirty secret in their violent lives. Their mission: to retrieve the nearly priceless Identity Disc -- purported to contain the true identities, the home addresses and even the credit reports of every hero in the Marvel Universe. To obtain the disc, hidden deep in the bowels of a practically impenetrable A.I.M. terrorist base, this agent will need an army. Or six super-villains. But how long can these psychopaths work together before the chaos begins?
name: Pt. 1

description: When a sinister collection of six powerful and deadly villains are blackmailed by a mysterious woman, they're forced to form an uneasy alliance to save the lives of their loved ones. But can this group, which includes Sabretooth, Bullseye, Deadpool, and the Juggernaut, work together to secure a mysterious disc before self-destructing?
name: Pt. 2

description: Six of Marvel’s deadliest villains have been blackmailed into pulling a job. On an apparent suicide mission, the team must break into a heavily guarded, nearly impenetrable A.I.M. terrorist base and retrieve a small disc that can literally shift the balance of power in the world. On the disc? The civilian identities of every costumed hero on Earth. But how will the team’s world-class size, brawn and savagery fare against the enemy's sheer numbers?
name: Pt. 3

description: Blackmailed into the service of a mysterious woman, the team of deadly villains embarks on a suicide mission to retrieve the priceless Identity Disc--rumored to contain the secret identities of every hero in the Marvel Universe - from the bowels of an A.I.M. terrorist base in the heart of Manhattan.
name: Pt. 4

description:
Faced with overwhelming odds, the villains are forced to put their lives on the line to secure the Identity Disc! Will they succeed...or will they pay the ultimate price? The dramatic conclusion to the series!

The plan is coming to a finish but it's not going as well as hoped. Afterwords, Nick Fury is interrogating a captured Vulture about the scheme. They go through step by step Nick Fury concludes that it was Sabretooth that hired them all to steal the disc. But he was wrong. Vulture has a secret. His daughter works for S.H.I.E.L.D. and if anyone found out, she could be in danger.
name: Pt. 5

description: Hide in Plain Sight Part 2 of 5
name: Hide in Plain Sight, Part 2

description: Hide In Plain Sight Part 3 of 5
name: Hide in Plain Sight, Part 3

description: Hide In Plain Sight Part 4 of 5
name: Hide in Plain Sight, Part 4

description: Dr.Banner, Pamela Greyson and Carl Creel, AKA the Absorbing Man (inside the body of a small girl) arrive at the cemetery underneath which Creels holding cell is located
name: Hide in plain sight part 5

description:
Creepy crawly creatures, the return of Doc Samson, and the real Mr. Blue is unmasked in this new 6-issue story arc featuring the return of Mike Deodato!

Bruce Banner while in New York City tries to contact Mr. Blue via his secure laptop but keeps getting a "Malfunction" message. After one such attempt he is followed by a man in a suit. Banner is able to disarm the man but when he questions the man he tells Bruce they know where you are.

Doc Sampson sneaks back into one of his old bases where he finds Kevin, a young boy Doc has befriended being held hostage by a group of men. With the help of Sandra Verdugo, Doc is easily able to dispatch the men. He then sends Kevin home and asks Sandra what she wants. She needs him to fix a laptop that she has been using to communicate with Banner. She also tells him that Ricki Myers is his son. Doc learns that the laptop signal has been hacked and Home Base knows where they are.

In the desert, Nadia Blonsky finds Agent S-3 dieing on her porch. She takes her inside and lets her rest. Nadia then finds S-3 laptop and tries to use it communicate with Banner, but get the Malfunction Message too. S-3 wakes up and tries to fight Nadia but is no match for the Russian. When asks who she is working for S-3 says they know where we are now.
name: Split Decisions, Part 1

description: As Bruce Banner flees New York City to the desert home of his former lover and colleague Nadia Blonsky, Home Base unleashes yet another sinister plan to destroy The Hulk! Beware Operation Krill!
name: Split Decisions, Part 3

description: The Hulk is going crazy and is getting ready to kill Betty Banner, but he calms down just before it. Then these little bugs that the U.S. Army sent out to get hulk blood to bring back to the Army base suddenly come out of no where. But the thing is there are thousands. So if one little bug gets away with the Hulk's blood the Hulk blood is out. And also lots of the bugs consume Betty Banner and Nadia Blonsky and then Hulk throws them in a pool full of water. So is the Hulk's blood going to get out, And are Betty, and Nadia okay. If i were you I would find out!
name: Split Decisions, Part 4

description: More cover-to-cover action, as the Hulk tracks the Krills back to Home Base for some much-deserved ... HULK SMASHING!
name: Split Decisions, Part 5

description: High noon in the desert as Doc Samson and Sandra Verdugo converge on Home Base, where the Hulk has wreaked some serious havoc... and where someone else is waiting for them.
name: Split Decisions Part 6 of 6: Double Exposure

description: In the aftermath of last issue's carnage, Bruce and Sandra try to patch together their lives. Meanwhile, "Mr. Blue" – a.k.a. [SPOILER WARNING!] Bruce's wife Betty Ross – finds solace in the arms of none other than Doc Samson.
name: Dead Like Me, Part 1

description: There's something big and weird and downright nasty out there in the desert and Doc Samson and "Mr. Blue" have just stumbled into it. Their only hope just might be Banner and his monstrous alter ego.
name: Dead Like Me , Part 2

description: There's something big and weird and downright nasty out there in the desert…and it wants everything Bruce Banner has … EVERYTHING!!
name: Dead Like Me, Part 3

description: There's something big and weird and downright nasty out there in the desert…and it wants everything Bruce Banner has … EVERYTHING!!
name: Dead Like Me, Part 4

description: The MARVEL KNIGHTS HULK era begins with a self-contained prologue to a 4-part story arc, introducing a mysterious young man who just might hold the key to Bruce Banner – and the Hulk's – future. Then in HULK #71, the Hulk goes toe-to-toe with IRON MAN in a classic super hero showdown!
name: Simetry

description:
Hulk goes toe-to-toe with IRON MAN in a classic super hero showdown!

Playboy Tony Stark's latest girlfriend and companion- Lisa Cummings- has been discovered dead in her apartment, victim of an apparent suicide. In an attempt to defuse a potential scandal, Stark convenes an open forum press conference- during which his attempts to play down the media's questions make him even more suspect... particulary when the press inquires about recent shipments of gamma photons allegedly arriving a the Stark International Labs.

One spectator in particular pricks up his ears- Bruce Banner. What could Stark be doing with such volatile and hazardous element? To find out, Banner begins a one-man surveillance operation of Stark- an operation that ends when Stark confronts him in a moonlit alley. Their conversation is barely underway when a bullet rings out, winging Banner, and unleashing the Hulk.

A brief but brutal brawl between the Hulk and Iron Man ensues- interrupted by the arrival of the police... during which Banner is astonished to find Stark not only covering for him before the officers, but inviting him to stay- incognito- at his famous playboy mansion!

Alone in Stark's own bedroom, Banner finds the conveniently placed diary of Lisa Cummings, with the last page mysteriously ripped out... The mystery only deepens when Banner's reverie is interrupted when the alleyway sniper glides though the window to finish the job he started earlier. Or so Banner thinks.

The assassin discloses it wasn't Banner's life he wanted at all... but revenge on the man he claims murdered his sister, Lisa Cummings: Tony Stark!

Witnessing the above through hidden bedroom cameras, Stark and his trusted butler Jeeves can only wonder if Bruce Banner believes Lisa's purported brother... and more importantly does the Hulk??
name: Big Things, Part 1

description:
Round two of the Hulk squaring off against the invincible Iron Man!

Alone and still on the run in Los Angeles, Bruce Banner witnesses a hastily prepared news conference between the media and industrial genius Tony Stark, A.K.A. Iron Man. Stark has been accused of involvement in the suicide of his latest item, Lisa Cummings...and worse perhaps, a recent association with the deadly gamma isotope that first turned Bruce Banner into the Hulk.

Finding himself a guest in Stark's mansion, Banner becomes the target of a deadly sniper who, once captured, reveals himself as Lisa Cummings' brother, Richard- accusing the millionaire playboy of murdering his sister.

Stark chains Richard in the mansion's wine cellar, then bares his chest to Banner, admitting his part in a government-funded project to deter terrorists from a gamma bomb attack. Facing an impossible deadline to invent a suit that will withstand a gamma bomb blast, Stark enlists Banner's help.

Banner agrees and begins testing with Stark and his partner Jack Rutledge. But unknown to anyone Richard Cummings, in his wine cellar prison below, listens to every secret step of the project via a miniature transmitter he attached to Stark's pant-cuff during his capture.
name: Big Things, Part 2

description:
The Hulk and Iron Man's explosive showdown reaches an unbelievable climax!

Bruce Banner is hiding out in the mansion of Tony "Iron Man" Stark, where Stark in conducting a top secret project with the government to build a and test a new, impregnable gamma-proof suit against future terrorist threats.

Soon after his arrival Banner is attacked in Stark's bedroom by Richard Cummings, who insists Tony is to blame for the mysterious death of his sister Lisa. At Stark's urging, Banner agrees to remain silent while Richard is kept under "house arrest" in the wine cellar. Banner further agrees to assist Stark and partner Jack Rutledge in perfecting the gamma-proof suit.

But the government's impossible deadline for delivery is taking its toll on and already exhausted Stark. Both Banner and Rutledge now insist Stark's flesh wound, received by Richard, makes further research too dangerous. Tony orders the final test to proceed as scheduled- with himself inside the suit.

Meanwhile Richard Cummings uses his charm to steal a hairpin from the lovely Nicole and frees himself... Then overpowers a guard whose uniform he steals- all the while maniacally vowing revenge on Stark-even if it means killing Banner and Rutledge in the process.
name: Big Things, Part 3

description: Against a gamma-irradiated backdrop, the Hulk and Iron Man go toe-to-toe in the conclusion of this 4-part story. Who will smash, and what will happen to the smashed??
name: Big Things, Part 4

description: All will be revealed in this arc - including the identity of the man behind the sneering lips! When Banner awakens in a post-apocalyptic future, his problems are just beginning. The mastermind behind the plot that made him a fugitive has big plans for the Hulk.
name: Wake To Nightmare

description: The second of two double-sized issues - the secret behind the plot that made the Hulk a fugitive, and the big plans for big green!
name: Shattered
